programme.title: Oliver North’s diminished popularity
programme.short_synopsis: Colonel Oliver North's brief moment as a popular hero to a minority in the US.
programme.medium_synopsis: Three months after admitting his role in the Iran-Contra affair, Alistair Cooke reflects on Colonel Oliver North's brief moment as a popular hero to a minority in the US.
